git.message:
✅ Restructured deploy folder for Render deployment with Node.js

Changes:
- Added root package.json with Express server
- Created server.js to serve static files and docs
- Added render.yaml for automatic Render deployment
- Created build scripts for automated deployment
- Added proper .gitignore
- Removed PowerShell scripts (not needed for Render)

Structure:
- / → Landing page (public/index.html)
- /docs/ → Docusaurus documentation
- /[project]/ → Future sub-projects

Deployment: Push to GitHub and connect to Render

structure.description: Multi-project platform ready for Render deployment

routes./: Landing page with links to all projects
